model.event

Class EventDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DAO
      • model.event.EventDAO

  • public class EventDAO
extends DAO
    The DAO class for the event table, which extends the DAO class.
    Author:
    Tiago DOS SANTOS, François KIM, Philippe PUONG, Axel SAINTILLAN
